wpt.name: GC2GBVY
wpt.desc: Where the Fluff is it? #1: The Exton Witch Project by ballseth254, pezbo33, Traditional Cache (3/3)
wpt.urlname: Where the Fluff is it? #1: The Exton Witch Project

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Where the Fluff is it? #1: The Exton Witch Project
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: This is #1 in a planned series called "Where the Fluff is it?" from ballseth254 & pezbo33
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
In case you are unfamiliar of this nearby location, please click on the links below.
http://www.strangeusa.com/ViewLocation.aspx?locationid=59106&desc= The Witch House Exton PA
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Fx7nnMuUmg
We thought this would be a cool place to hide a cache, especially this close to Halloween.
We do not recommend going at night. It will be extremely difficult. Plus, it will give you the creeps!
Also, we forgot a pen in a container that would definitely fit one! If someone can add one before we get a chance to go back, please do. BYOP
Getting too close to the actual house is unnecessary. There is a second way to reach the cache also. Both ways have plenty of parking.
The reason we ranked the difficulty and terrain as a 3/3 is due to eery feeling of the nearby area, and that it's VERY difficult at night.
For people that say the difficulty and terrain should be lower, try going at night and see if you think it should be graded lower. :)
Respect the area!
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:encoded_hints: "_____ ___ ______ downtown, is where I drew some blood. _____ ___ ______ I could not get enough. _____ ___ ______, Forgot about my love. _____ ___ ______, I gave my life away."

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: I've been meaning to get to this one for quite a while, finally did. Found with dawnie22 and our girls.
